alert.note: Alert for Benton (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 2:05AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Benton County through 245 AM CDT... At 205 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Garrison, or 8 miles west of Vinton, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Garrison around 210 AM CDT. Vinton around 215 AM CDT. Keystone around 225 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Van Horne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
